original_title: ‘Yal Devi’ derails near Maho Railway Station
original_body_lines: The ‘Yal Devi’ train derailed plying from Anuradhapura to Colombo has derailed near the Maho Railway Station.
Accordingly, the Railway Department reported that a carriage of the train had derailed near the Maho Railway Station.
They confirmed, however, that the derailed carriage is currently being put back on to the track.
